snippet: Andrew and Aaron Harrison have been praised for their talent and criticized for their demeanors, but they have found their footing recently with the Wildcats.
abstract: Profile of twins Andrew and Aaron Harrison, starting backcourt for the Kentucky Wildcats, who have begun to live up to hype as team prepares for the Final Four; twins, who have been both praised for their talent and criticized for their demeanors, have begun to contemplate a future in the NBA.

byline.contributor: Ben Strauss contributed reporting from Indianapolis and Ben Shpigel from Arlington, Tex.

lead_paragraph: Andrew and Aaron Harrison have been praised for their talent and criticized for their demeanors, but they have found their footing recently with the Wildcats.

headline.main: Polarizing Wildcats Find Their Way Together
headline.print_headline: Polarizing Wildcats Find Their Way Together
